attributes.action: Make over time hours worked tax free.
attributes.additional_details: Everything is taxed. Let us have our overtime wages without being taxed. It will boost local economies quicker because we are likely to have more disposable income.
attributes.background: We work overtime just to help us get by. We need to benefit from it. Not the government.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701418
